name: part_006
file: tmp_【#Myth5years】hololive English -Myth- 5th Anniversary Concert： Fortune Spinner [HT_HUFi8DJ4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: MC segment featuring Takanashi Kiara, Mori Calliope, and Ninomae Ina'nis discussing their previous group performance and upcoming solo songs.
Solo stage performance by Takanashi Kiara.

subtitles.original:
It was a lot of fun, it was difficult,
of course my heart rate shot through the roof.
subtitles.english:
It was a lot of fun, it was difficult,
of course my heart rate shot through the roof.

subtitles.original: But we did it.
subtitles.english: But we did it.

subtitles.original: We did it.
subtitles.english: We did it.

subtitles.original: And then me and Ina did some air guitar.
subtitles.english: And then me and Ina did some air guitar.

subtitles.original: Yeah.
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original:
My original song, Sepia, was a...
very close song to my heart.
subtitles.english:
My original song, Sepia, was a...
very close song to my heart.

subtitles.original: And Ina played guitar by the way.
subtitles.english: And Ina played guitar by the way.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I loved the purple guitar.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I loved the purple guitar.

subtitles.original: Yeah, so cool.
subtitles.english: Yeah, so cool.

subtitles.original: But what's still missing now?
subtitles.english: But what's still missing now?

subtitles.original:
Oh, there are a couple songs missing, aren't there?
Like WAWA's song, my song...
subtitles.english:
Oh, there are a couple songs missing, aren't there?
Like WAWA's song, my song...

subtitles.original: A lot of unit songs...
subtitles.english: A lot of unit songs...

subtitles.original: And mine and Calli's combination song...
subtitles.english: And mine and Calli's combination song...

subtitles.original:
I wonder why...
I wonder, I wonder.
subtitles.english:
I wonder why...
I wonder, I wonder.

subtitles.original:
I will just say that the song for me and Calli
was also chosen, kind of suggested by me.
subtitles.english:
I will just say that the song for me and Calli
was also chosen, kind of suggested by me.

subtitles.original: Thank you for... thank you for being okay with it.
subtitles.english: Thank you for... thank you for being okay with it.

subtitles.original:
It's a nice song. I don't want to spoil anything,
but it was pretty good.
subtitles.english:
It's a nice song. I don't want to spoil anything,
but it was pretty good.

subtitles.original:
And my solo will be...
eh... epic and hyped! So look forward to it.
subtitles.english:
And my solo will be...
eh... epic and hyped! So look forward to it.

subtitles.original:
What's the music? Can you give a hint?
I know it's about to happen pretty soon here, but...
subtitles.english:
What's the music? Can you give a hint?
I know it's about to happen pretty soon here, but...

subtitles.original: No! No! No hints!
subtitles.english: No! No! No hints!

subtitles.original: Alright, alright.
subtitles.english: Alright, alright.

subtitles.original: Why? I'm a toddler, why?
subtitles.english: Why? I'm a toddler, why?

subtitles.original:
Yes, we still have a lot of our show left over,
so don't tune out. There's lots more! Stay with us!
subtitles.english:
Yes, we still have a lot of our show left over,
so don't tune out. There's lots more! Stay with us!

subtitles.original: Stay right here.
subtitles.english: Stay right here.

subtitles.original: Don't move.
subtitles.english: Don't move.

subtitles.original:
Wait and continue to watch until the end.
And use the hashtag! Don't forget that.
subtitles.english:
Wait and continue to watch until the end.
And use the hashtag! Don't forget that.

subtitles.original: Okay, hashtag.
subtitles.english: Okay, hashtag.

subtitles.original:
Are we ready to move on? Move on?
Okay.
subtitles.english:
Are we ready to move on? Move on?
Okay.

subtitles.original: What should we do?
subtitles.english: What should we do?

subtitles.original:
No, what should we do?
We should play with the camera.
subtitles.english:
No, what should we do?
We should play with the camera.

subtitles.original:
What do you want to do, Ina?
What do you want to do the most?
subtitles.english:
What do you want to do, Ina?
What do you want to do the most?

subtitles.original: I know what to do...
subtitles.english: I know what to do...

subtitles.original: Oh?
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: What are you going to do?
subtitles.english: What are you going to do?

subtitles.original: Not something violent, right?
subtitles.english: Not something violent, right?

subtitles.original:
Oh! She's going to do something violent!
She's doing something violent!
subtitles.english:
Oh! She's going to do something violent!
She's doing something violent!

subtitles.original: Hee-yah!
subtitles.english: Hee-yah!

subtitles.original: Confessions of a Rotten Girl
subtitles.english: Confessions of a Rotten Girl

subtitles.original: Dear God, I've come to repent my sins.
subtitles.english: Dear God, I've come to repent my sins.

subtitles.original: Let your blood wash me clean, for I'm...
subtitles.english: Let your blood wash me clean, for I'm...

subtitles.original: I'm a rotten girl!
subtitles.english: I'm a rotten girl!

subtitles.original: I swore I'd never sin again
subtitles.english: I swore I'd never sin again

subtitles.original: But my patience's running thin
subtitles.english: But my patience's running thin

subtitles.original: Temptation's flowing through my veins
subtitles.english: Temptation's flowing through my veins

subtitles.original: And bounded by the shackles of shame
subtitles.english: And bounded by the shackles of shame

subtitles.original: I promised I'd indulge no more
subtitles.english: I promised I'd indulge no more

subtitles.original: But my heart I can't ignore
subtitles.english: But my heart I can't ignore

subtitles.original: In my dreams they're turning up the heat
subtitles.english: In my dreams they're turning up the heat

subtitles.original: I'm a dirty rotten girl
subtitles.english: I'm a dirty rotten girl

subtitles.original: I'm locked underneath the bleachers
subtitles.english: I'm locked underneath the bleachers

subtitles.original: Just watch, look beyond the smoke and mirrors
subtitles.english: Just watch, look beyond the smoke and mirrors

subtitles.original: Hearts struck, shun the unbeliever
subtitles.english: Hearts struck, shun the unbeliever

subtitles.original: Our reparation would never be complete
subtitles.english: Our reparation would never be complete

subtitles.original: Red hot tension in each whisper
subtitles.english: Red hot tension in each whisper

subtitles.english: Snapshot, quiet moans and muffled whimpers

subtitles.original: Come on, can't you feel the fever
subtitles.english: Come on, can't you feel the fever

subtitles.original: Rising up, rising up to the sky
subtitles.english: Rising up, rising up to the sky

subtitles.original: And as the realm of toxic fear slips beneath my skin
subtitles.english: And as the realm of toxic fear slips beneath my skin

subtitles.original: The Lord sayeth, 'Help my child, don't give in to sin'

subtitles.english: Somehow I just can't control myself
